Qualys Ransomware Risk Assessment Service

Thank you for signing up for the Ransomware Risk Assessment Service trial! Your new Qualys subscription has been provisioned. You will receive a separate confirmation email with your username and instructions to create a password.

Get to know Ransomware Risk Assessment Service


You have taken the right step towards understanding your organization's potential exposure to ransomware attacks by signing up for this trial.


Now that the Ransomware Risk Assessment Service is enabled you can:

  discover and inventory all your assets and prioritize the ransomware vulnerabilities and misconfiguration
  enable zero-touch automated patching for these vulnerabilities using the same Agent
  view the dashboard widgets to get unified real-time tracking of all actionable insights

Use the Qualys Cloud capabilities provisioned in your subscription to start assessing and mitigating your ransomware risk exposure.
